backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing posts and user profiles with access control, supporting CRUD operations and profile retrieval with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to their relevant files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme variables and base styles for light and dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry component configuring TanStack Router routes and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/IdentityInd: Badge displaying the current user's profile name or principal when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting first-time users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Page header with banner, logo, navigation, identity indicator, and authentication button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Root layout containing header, routed content outlet, footer, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostAction: Provides edit and delete buttons for a post, including a confirmation dialog and delete mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Displays a preview card for a post with title, truncated body, author snippet, and timestamp.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and updates the callerâ€™s user profile using actor-based queries and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity login, state management, and persistence using AuthClient and React context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosts.ts: Provides queries and mutations for listing, fetching, creating, updating, and deleting posts via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and warm-themed light/dark CSS variables for global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Shows full post content, author info, and edit/delete actions for the author, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/PostEditorPage.tsx: Provides a post creation and editing form, handling authentication checks, loading states, and saving posts via create or update hooks.
frontend/src/pages/PostsFeedPage.tsx: Displays the posts feed with loading and error states, showing posts or empty-state messaging and offering a new-post link for authenticated users.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting timestamps into readable dates and truncating principal strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings with custom plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, pending requests, assets requirements, and overall app objectives.
